kpi.name: M5000C330

kpi_info.title: SUM OF CAPABLE DC HSDPA USERS
kpi_info.use: The sum of sampled values for the number of capable DC-HSDPA users. UPDATED: The sampled number of users is summed to this counter when sampled value is for capable DC-HSDPA user. The counter is updated regardless of the fact whether user receive data or not.

kpi.kpi_alias: SUM OF CAPABLE DC HSDPA USERS
